title: Dashboard Improvements & New Filters
content:
🎉 New Features:
• Enhanced dashboard with real-time metrics
• Advanced filtering options for ideas
• Improved search functionality
• New activity feed design

🐛 Bug Fixes:
• Fixed issue with vote counts not updating
• Resolved mobile layout problems
• Fixed timezone display issues

🔧 Improvements:
• Faster page loading times
• Better responsive design
• Improved error handling

content:

⚡ Performance:

• Resolved comment threading issues
• Fixed export functionality
